text: Mira Hoteit (; born 20 September 2000) is a Lebanese professional footballer who plays as a defender for Lebanese club Safa and the Lebanon national team. ==Club career== Hoteit joined Safa in 2019; she played 10 games in the 2019–20 season. ==References== ==External links== * Mira Hoteit at Global Sports Archive * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:People from Nabatieh Category:Lebanese women's footballers Category:Lebanon women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Lebanese Women's Football League players Category:Lebanon women's youth international footballers Category:Zouk Mosbeh SC footballers Category:Safa WFC players
title: Mira Hoteit
